author: Megan Ellis
title: Watch: Elephants walk through lobby
text:
Watch: Elephants walk through lobby Article By: Megan Ellis Mon, 17 Aug 2015 8:25 AM Share Your Email Credit: The Bushcamp Company/YouTube 
"A herd of elephants walk into a hotel lobby" sounds like the beginning of a joke, but that's what happens at Mfuwe Lodge in Zambia. 
A video showing elephants walking through the reception area of the lodge has been trending online, giving viewers a glimpse of this unique and amazing sight. 
According to The Bushcamp Company , the wild elephants are taking a shortcut through the lodge's reception area to a ripe mango tree. 
The event seems out of this world, with full-grown elephants and calves roaming through the lobby casually. 
The video also shows pictures of the elephants napping around the tree. 
It then shows adorable footage of a baby elephant trying to master the steps of the lodge. 
Another baby then takes a nap in the middle of the lodge's lobby. 
Watch the amazing footage below: Related Articles
